name: KanaRun
description:
This is a little Game for learning Japanese Kana ... for now Hiragana.

( for now mostly in GERMAN ... but give it a try there is not much text )

Playable in Browser or as Gameboy Rom for your Emulator.

--------

Controls: Z  , X  , Enter , Shift ,  Arrow Keys

or ... 

Up - Up Arrow / W

Down - Down Arrow / S

Left - Left Arrow / A

Right - Right Arrow / D

A - Alt / Z / J

B - Ctrl / K / X

Start - Enter

Select - Shift

------------------

Note: - there is no sound / music 

BETA 02 - Made with GB Studio 2 Beta - 202012 EP
